Javascript 1 5 Goes Beta

13 Jan 2000

JavaScript 1.5 is in beta form from the folks at Netscape.

\n

\nNew features include conditional function declaration, new number formatting, and regexp enchancments. The new version is included in the latest Mozilla clients, or you can download the latest develpment engines at Mozillas Website.\n
